synopsis.text:
Carrot's amorous pursuits, Chocolate's unrequited affection, and a whole lot of whip-wielding action return in a series of steamy and side-splitting escapades! In a world where the Sorcerer Hunters stand as the last defense against uncontrollable dark magic, this band of heroes – including the stunning Chocolate, the fierce Tira, and the muscular Gateau – find themselves navigating the treacherous waters of love and lust.

First, a relaxing hot springs vacation turns into a sultry showdown as Carrot attempts to seduce a beautiful older woman, while Chocolate sets her sights on Carrot. Then, the team faces off against the nefarious Death Master, a necromancer who has transformed an entire town into his zombie minions. And finally, an ancient tree with legendary romantic powers turns a serene picnic into a chaotic love-frenzy!

With their hormones raging and evil lurking around every corner, can the Sorcerer Hunters save the day while also navigating the complexities of their own hearts? Join them in these thrilling and titillating adventures, where the stakes are high, and the laughter never ends!
